attributes.action: Allow the creation of a new indoor skate park/plaza in Reading, Berkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently there are very few areas for youths to skate in Reading and the surrounding areas. Most of which are run down, vandalised and open to bad weather. The Reading area needs a skate park that is large enough and well maintained so that youths are not skating on the streets and in areas where they are causing trouble and damage to property. Reading is a very suitable place to have an indoor skate park because it is very much in the center of Berkshire and it would be totally unique to Reading and surrounding areas within the south.

rejection.details: We suggest that you contact your local council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
